plot: After a bumpy start, the women head off on separate adventures. Meghan takes Kelly to nearby village in an attempt to locate distant relatives, while Vicki, Tamra, Heather and Shannon travel to a milk farm. The two groups reconvene for dinner where Kelly tries to make amends with Tamra. However, tensions reemerge and bombs fly when the ladies make their way back to the airport, leaving this group of friends in disarray like never before.
